name: TestsByMicroscopicObservationInStool
title: Tests by Microscopic Observation in Stool
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of organisms by microscopic observation in stool),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Tests by Microscopic Observation in Stool),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
